item.title: Daily Fly Tipping, 22nd September
item.description:
Daily fly tipping outside our building - please interrogate and see who keeps leaving bags here. Foxes get in and as soon as it's cleared, people dump more bags! These bags have been here since last week.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Scawfell Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven Surface, 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastcote Road, Falconwood, London

item.title: Outside no 26, 22nd September
item.description:
We submitted earlier that the you tree needed re-staking as the stakes got lose off the ground. although it was nicely fixed by your team last week, the stakes again got lose and the tree isn't enough supported. we would appreciate if you could send the team again to reinforce the stakes better or even use a third stake. kind regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Belsize Square, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 31 and 96 Marquis Road, 22nd September
item.description:
For the past few days, streetlights have not been working outside nos. 31 or 96 Marquis Road, or outside nos. 6 and 94 St Augustine's Road. I live at 78 Marquis Road and the top of the street (and round the corner in St Augustine's Road) is dangerously dark. Please can you fix them all? (I'm also reporting the failed street light at number 6 St Augustine's, which is down the other end of St Augustine's Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marquis Road, Tufnell Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
